website_summaries.verdict: This five-piece playset is a fantastic gift for tiny mermaid lovers thanks to its snuggly and safe sensory toys and perfectly sized shell-shaped bag.
pros: Includes plush mermaid rattle, squeaky starfish, crinkly seahorse, and noisy dolphin in seashell bag
Bag is easy for babies to open and close
cons: A little pricey but extremely well-made

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item, used it on the mermaid diaper cake I made 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a mermaid loving little girl.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend's 9 month old daughter. This toy is perfect for sensory play. One of the characters has a noise box that when squeezed plays sound, another character crinkles when squeezed, and the third squeaks. The toys are a great size for little hands and the bag/purse they all come in is adorable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just gifted this to a friend's daughter for her 1st bday. She absolutely Loved it (the baby; but the mama did too). My 6 yr old daughter wants one too. It's very well made, adorable, soft, and entertaining. I will, without doubt, buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harris

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby niece. The quality is nice and each item makes a sound. The mermaid is a rattle, the star a squeaky toy, the sea-horse sounds like when you scrunch up paper and the dolphin makes a wave sound. I was pleasantly surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Aquiana A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys that pack into the seashell pouch. Mermaid ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute toys that pack into the seashell pouch. Mermaid is a rattle, dolphin plays an ocean sound, starfish speaks, and seahorse makes a crinkle sound. Baby loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play set!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy for my mermaid obsessed girls! So cute and the dolphin making the ocean noises is so soothing!! Love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected great toy/gift can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, Great toy for a 1 year old! each little toy does a different thing in the starfish there is a squeaker, the sea horse is crinkles, the dolphin makes ocean sounds and mermaid is a rattle. Also great for traveling with the little shell case, would def recommend and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My niece is going to love this...! I can’t wait to give it to her!! It’s way bigger than I expected and super soft! The pieces fit into the purse and it’s so cute! This was a way nicer gift honestly than I expected it to be. I’m really happy I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great. I didn’t have to deal with the condescending Amazon Customer “Service” supervisors like I did for another item. Amazon Customer Service used to be AMAZING, now they essentially do not care what the buyer says. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Zack D

customer_reviews.title: Cute set for one year old!
customer_reviews.text: This set it really cute. I have it as a gift, along with a personalized mermaid book, for a one year old. I'll say it was a bit smaller than I was assuming, it still great for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite is the crinkly seahorse
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our go-to bags for whenever we take our 5 month old out. She loves the noises that all of the items make. Her favorite is the crinkly seahorse. All of the things are perfect for her to pick up and chew on. And it is convenient to have the bag to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kari B

customer_reviews.title: A cute item for that special little gal
customer_reviews.text: This shell with the darling contents is perfect for the young daughter of our marine biologist granddaughter!! All of the items are cute and something any child would love. I feel that the value was very good for the cost of this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Scorse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to an old coworker for her 1 yr old daughter, it was perfect. She loves it. It’s a good quality gift, I was scared it would be too young for a 1 year old but it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hagge

customer_reviews.title: So cute, perfect gift for a little girl.
customer_reviews.text: This was even cuter in person then in the photo. Well made as Gund plush toys always are. My grandniece loved it. All the pieces fit into the clam plush purse for easy carrying about by a three year old.
customer_reviews.author: happycook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for infants!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toy! My baby girl is 4 months old and its her favorite. Perfect size for her to hold and chew and they make different noises which she loves. Its a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buonanno

customer_reviews.title: One of every type is absolutely necessary!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, I love the different toys and their different sounds and actions. Adorable, great for my daughters 1y/o friend. And my 9 month old daughter. They love the plush bag and different toys. Will be buying multiple for my own daughter! <3
customer_reviews.author: Corie Stamatelatos

customer_reviews.title: Should be advertised for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. It's super cute but definitely more of a baby toy (she's two). She's really not interested in it but a younger kid would probably love it.
customer_reviews.author: kate mullins

customer_reviews.title: Trust Gund toys to be fun.
customer_reviews.text: Our Granddaughter loved her Mermaid plush toy. Sweet little sea creatures tucked into another sweet clamshell purse. She loves it! The size is perfect, softness and color. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Purse is GENIUS!
customer_reviews.text: The most perfect gift for a 1 year old. Mermaid and her friends inside of a clam purse?! Adorable! I'll be purchasing more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Novak

customer_reviews.title: The clam shell purse that holds the items is adorable. One thing
customer_reviews.text: The 9 month old that I purchased this for just loves it. The clam shell purse that holds the items is adorable. One thing...the little star is quite small and the mother took it away until the child is older. She thought it was small enough to choke on.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft! The little pieces inside the shell purse have different qualities (e.g crinkly) so they’ll be great for my 1 year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my one year old loves this. She hugs the little stuffies and says “Awh” I think she enjoys the little sounds each make, I see her shaking or crinkling them pretty often. This was a Christmas gift and it really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 1 1/2 year old and a 4 year old and they both loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Gift received rave reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to a mother-to-be who was using a seashore/beach girl theme for her nursery. It was the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: leaninfrog

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Now 3months later it sits in her toy chest untouched.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Super cute mermaid set
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cute. The whole mermaid set is so soft. Will be a perfect size for my new grandchild to play with. The little sea shell pouch to carry/store them in is cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft , just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as advertised. They are really cute and the perfect size for my 9 month old, this will be her first (personal) purse. I would buy this again, and may do so soon if our friends have a girl (gender will be a surprise). The purse and plushies are well made, and each toy makes a noise or rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Idea was cute but the toys inside are just stuffed no noise no rattle nothing exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Jpzee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!  Baby niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my niece for her first birthday - she LOVED it on sight! Was a big hit with everyone. Each of the creatures has its own unique sound, and the mermaid rattles. Adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Girl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, Soft & well made
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little toy,. It looks really made well out of good materials...soft and cuddly too! Bought to go in a baby shower gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Dauzat

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. The material is a little scratchy but the kids don’t seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Cute mermaid toy set
customer_reviews.text: A cute toy set for a mermaid theme baby shower. Each piece is unique and fun. I wish all of the pieces fit better in the storage clam (some pieces stick out when closed)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thayer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it, especially the mermaid
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 7-month old niece. She loved it, especially the mermaid.
customer_reviews.author: cheryllf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter than I imagined. I love this perse and the treasures inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Gave it child, she squealed so loud it hurt
customer_reviews.text: If you're stumped for a gift for a little girl, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: fun little play set to travel with
customer_reviews.text: So cute, fun little play set to travel with. My one year old loves it. Makes a perfect gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle O

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid purse
customer_reviews.text: She loved it! So cute. Can play with the set for years. Made well
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable... gave as a gift for 1 year old for under the sea theme party,
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Such a great gift for a little girl
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr. old granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed watching carry it around. Perfect gift for a 1 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Great for sensory also! All the toys make noise!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Holdaway

customer_reviews.title: Fun Mermaid things
customer_reviews.text: My little grand baby loves the noises each toy makes and wrapped very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is of good quality. Soft and well put together, my baby niece loved this very girly mermaid toy. My expectations were exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Just gave this as a shower gift and the Mom loved it! Gund always delivers SUPER soft items
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute for baby! Just gave this as a shower gift and the Mom loved it! Gund always delivers SUPER soft items, and this is just that. Pieces are small for baby to grasp and play with. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Franz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and the bag holds any toy your child wants to lug around long after they lose the little mermaid dolly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazone Customare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, I paid $25 and it was probably a little pricey but well made
customer_reviews.author: Diandra Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Letters are missing on the purse
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this little purse and the mermaid. However now I’m very disappointed the letters on the purse are very low quality. It came with letters missing. I can not give this as a gift now.
customer_reviews.author: Azra rizvanovic

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My niece's baby LOVED this! She loves mermaids and it is perfect for her age of one! The little purse is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, lots of fun putting the characters in and out of the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet. It's perfect for my little granddaughter (under a year) who is interested in new textures and sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Joni from Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and it fit the nursery theme for the baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and it fit the nursery theme for the baby girl. The toys are soft and can be played with by an infant, while the little carrier becomes a toddler's purse! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Allen

customer_reviews.text: Super soft, such a great simple toy for any little mermaids lover out there.
customer_reviews.author: LoudCat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gift for my granddaughter! Great quality and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi~

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little baby gift. All the toys have noisemakers or krincle paper or something entertaining for baby!

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute got this as a gift for my niece!
customer_reviews.author: Devyn

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift but they said she loves it. It came super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love gund toys
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, great lil set! Bought for Diaper cake I made, for a baby shower!!

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift to my best friends daughter who was 6 months old and she LOVES them! They are very entertaining!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute and my daughter loves all the different noises the pieces make

customer_reviews.title: Cute purse
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grand daughter for her birthday. She loves anything mermaid.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: very cute set to give as a gift. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable product. Each piece makes a different noise and all pieces are soft and nicely made.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 1 yr old and she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Too stinkin' cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute I'm buying another for the next baby on the way!

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because we are doing a baby shower in mermaid. Plus it is a shower gift

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and 3 year old nieces loved it!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it regardless
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected. Very cute but high on the price for what you get. My daughter loved it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my newborn. She loves to track the toys with her eyes. :) I can't wait until she can grab the toys and play with them. She especially loves the mermaid rattle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable!! Perfect for my little girl. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Parent

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love mermaids and I'm always looking for cute toys and books. This is a very cute set! Nice to have the little bag to store and keep them together. My granddaughters loved them !
customer_reviews.author: JANET HALL

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: This set was adorable, super cute and perfect. I used it for a diaper cake I made for a mermaid themed baby shower. Each piece makes a different noise for baby.
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Soft little toys. They all make a difference sound but nothing is loud or really annoying. A great gift for a little one who wants to be a mermaid
customer_reviews.author: hopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Great quality for price. Soft and easy for my granddaughter to hold. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

product_meta.title: Baby GUND Mermaid Adventure Stuffed Plush Playset, 10"
product_meta.description: Style:Mermaid AdventureGUND wants to make playtime a more huggable experience - The Mermaid Adventure Playset is full of imaginative nautical toys that will get baby ready for a day on the beach! This five-piece play set includes an iridescent purple touch-and-close fastener clamshell. Each carrying case contains one each of the following items: a mermaid rattle, a seahorse crinkle, a starfish squeak toy, and a dolphin sound toy. Bonus coloring sheet included. Your child's safety is our top concern, so this babyGUND product features embroidered details. Surface-washable for easy cleaning. Appropriate for all ages. About GUND: For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability.
feature_bullets: Purple clamshell tote case with touch-and-close fasteners
Five-piece playset includes: mermaid rattle, seahorse crinkle, starfish squeak toy, and dolphin sound toy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars310 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
